segments.text: I think Andy's party will be fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I think so . Oh , by the way , I need to ask you something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I get back the sweater you borrowed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Oh , that reminds me . Could I borrow your black leather boots ?
segments.speaker: S1
